room_title: Escape room "Prison Escape" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
room_description: This room is just like the jail cell you spent that one night in when you were a teenager, the only difference is you can actually escape this one without all the legal problems. Everyday items will be used to help in your escape and no escape plan is too farfetched. Brush up on your prison-themed movies they may aid in your escape!
